item.title: Summer (and cricket) is here!
item.author: Darshan Patel,Priyank Shah,
item.description: After what was quite a comfortable win the previous week, we were full of confidence as we travelled to Sussex. The opposition won the toss and elected to bat first on a wicket that offered plenty of assistance to the seamers early on. The Sussex captains decision to bat first was seeming like the â€¦
